page.title: 15CULLOMPTON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: St.Andrew's Junior School was built in 1937.There are 301 pupils and 11.2 teachers and a headmaster.School starts at 09.10,with an assembly from 09.25 to 09.45,then everyone studies maths until playtime at 10.40.After break we usually have English.After dinner we might have Science,Geography History,R.E.,Games, P.E.,Art,Craft or Music.In the summer we have swimming in our small outdoor pool. At lunch time and after school we have clubs.There are a lot of sports and music clubs,chess,stamp_collecting drama,gardening and sewing clubs as well.At Christmas we have parties and a carol service in church. If we are naughty we might be kept in at playtime,or be sent to the headmaster.
